title: Phial of Galadriel (3U24)
text:
Set:	Realms of the Elf-lords
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Elven
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Possession
Game Text:	To play, exert an Elf. Bearer must be the Ring-bearer. Bearer's resistance is +2.
Lore:	”'May it be a light to you in dark places, when all other lights go out. Remember Galadriel and her Mirror!'”
Rarity:	U
